attributes.action: We must Ban Fracking in UK
attributes.additional_details: Must ban fracking because we people do not want to drink poisonous water get there property have no value after a private company destroys there land whilst they cant do anything. What is this certainly not democracy, no its a totalitarian state. Yes we need energy but there is renewable energy you know. In USA there is 1000 of cases of health reports of people with serious health issues because of fracking. If you drink tap water then sign this!!!!!!
